title: Example of a Senate check on judicial power

content.prompt: The majority party in the Senate is concerned that the Supreme Court has made a number of ideologically dangerous and controversial rulings. Which of the following actions could be taken by the Senate to limit the Supreme Court’s power?

choices.label: Replace the chief justice of the Supreme Court with someone with whom they agree with ideologically
Pass legislation already passed by the House that would limit the impact of the Supreme Court’s recent rulings
Ratify a constitutional amendment limiting the Supreme Court’s power
Enforce term limits for justices on the Supreme Court
